Class Hierarchy
This inheritance list is sorted roughly, but not completely, alphabetically:
[detail level 12]
 CPropellerImageEncapsulates Propeller binary images
 CPropellerProtocolAlgorithms for interacting with the Propeller firmware
 ▼CQObject
 CPropellerLoaderImplements the Propeller download protocol
 CPropellerManagerAbstraction layer between PropellerSession and PropellerDevice instances
 CPropellerSessionPersistent, always-on interface to Propeller hardware via PropellerManager
 CPropellerTerminalSmall reference implementation of a serial terminal with PropellerManager
 ▼CQSerialPort
 CPropellerDeviceAccess to serial Propeller devices
